SUNDAE

A korean sundae is a type of blood sausage that is popular in Korea. It is made with pig's blood, rice, and vegetables, and is often served with a spicy dipping sauce.

4-6 servings 30 minutes
THIS IS AN ADVERT

Equipment

  • Bowl
  • Spoon
  • Frying pan
  • Tongs

Ingredients

  • Pig’s blood
  • Rice
  • Vegetables
  • Spicy dipping sauce

Directions

  1. Combine pig’s blood, rice, and vegetables in a bowl and mix well. 2.Shape mixture into small sausages.
  2. Fry sausages in a pan over medium heat until browned.
  3. Serve with a spicy dipping sauce.
